#### What this PR does / why we need it:
This pr fixes a race problem introduced by #128642

When using `exit 0` as the command of a container. After the container is terminated,`finishedAt - startedAt` can be -1 second, which violates the validation after.

Related job: https://prow.k8s.io/view/gs/kubernetes-ci-logs/pr-logs/pull/129680/pull-kubernetes-e2e-gce/1933002039273459712
